0.speaker: Player
0.text: An elder brain... That was the Heart of the Absolute?
0.context: NodeContext: Almost to self, processing this information

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Come. There is much to discuss - but we need not do it in this rotting place.
1.context: NodeContext: Weary - we've fought a huge battle and learned some deep revelations, but she wants to get to a place of safety before going into it

2.speaker: Player
2.text: At last, it is done. Ketheric Thorm will rise no more. All those who did not live to see this day can finally rest.
2.context: NodeContext: She's stunned and almost disbelieving Gortash is behind this

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Ketheric Thorm is dead - really dead, this time. Lady Shar's justice has been delivered.
3.context: NodeContext: She's stunned and almost disbelieving Gortash is behind this

4.speaker: Player
4.text: He's dead. He's finished. But Gortash... Gortash was here.
4.context: NodeContext: She's stunned and almost disbelieving Gortash is behind this

6.speaker: Player
6.text: The transformation Ketheric underwent was... horrifying. So powerful, but so grotesque.
6.context: NodeContext: Pleased. On the cusp of victory at last.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: There was barely anything of the man left, even before we finished him.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Ketheric Thorm's demise was the deathblow against the Shadow Curse also. We have done all that was asked about us. Thaniel will soon take care of the rest.
7.context: NodeContext: Pleased. On the cusp of victory at last.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Controlling an elder brain... Such power.
8.context: NodeContext: Almost to self, processing this information. A sense cogs are whirrig, but we don't yet know the reason
